translations: 来者，来的人；有成功希望的人

phrs.translation: 全体来人；前来(申请参加…)的人

sentences.sentence: The first comer was the sultan himself.
sentences.translation: 第一位来人是苏丹本人。

sentences.sentence: With the help of the Internet, information can reach every comer of the world quickly.
sentences.translation: 在互联网的帮助下，信息可以迅速到达世界的每一个角落。

sentences.sentence: He was thrilled to be doing the comedy that he always felt he should do, but even during his last few years, he always had a sense of curiosity, wondering what new role or challenge might be just around the comer.
sentences.translation: 他很高兴能出演这部他一直认为自己应该出演的喜剧，但即使是在他生命的最后几年，他也一直有一种好奇心，想知道他眼前可能还有什么新的角色或挑战。
